More informations available here:  <https://seolane.org/>

The adress of Seolane center is : 

Pôle d'accueil universitaire Séolane 

Quartier du 11è BCA

Chemin des Casernes

04400 Barcelonnette

**By Train** 

you can take a train to Gap (Paris-Gap by night for example or Marseille-Gap). Then, you take the bus 535 (Gap-Barcelonette, see <https://www.autocars-scal.fr/>) wich leaves you 15 minutes' walk from the Séolane center.

**By Bus from Marseille**

See <https://www.autocars-scal.fr/> for the bus map and schedule.

Depending on your schedule, you can take the Bus 28 which is direct:
  
- For Sunday, the 17th of November, you have the Bus number 28 at 7:00 am at Gare St Charles de Marseille, that arrives at 11:30 am at Barcelonnette, or you have the travel 16:30 pm (Marseille) to 20:00 (Barcelonette), then 15 minutes' walk.  [see the pdf](pdf/Bus_Ligne28.pdf)

- For Friday, the 22th of November, you have 15 minutes' walk, then the Bus number 28 at 16:45 pm at Barcelonette that arrives at 20:00 at Gare St Charles de Marseille [see the pdf](pdf/Bus_Ligne28.pdf)
  
- or you can take the 69 bus, then the 535 bus.


**By car**
you can book a car in Gap or in Marseille.
